title: Hour 1 : Mac Zappe-d
description:
Stephen A., Jeff Saturday, Keyshawn Johnson and Jay Williams discuss Ben Simmons underwhelming start to the season, what the short week can look like for the Buccaneers and who is the bigger disappointment: Russell Wilson or Matt Ryan?

itunes:subtitle: Should the Patriots start Bailey Zappe going forward?
